iBankingStep1: Go to Mandiri Internet Banking website ib.bankmandiri.co.id
iBankingStep2: Login with your USER ID and PIN
iBankingStep3: Go to the Home page, then select "Payment"
iBankingStep8: Enter your {{entity_name}} Mandiri virtual account number
iBankingStep10: Click on cash if all details are correct and then click on "CONTINUE"
iBankingStep12: Enter Challenge Code from your Internet Banking Token, then click on "Send"
iBankingStep13: You will be directed to the confirmation page once your payment has been completed
mBankingStep2: Select "Icon Menu" at the top left
mBankingStep7: Enter your {{entity_name}} Mandiri virtual account number
mBankingStep11: Enter the "PIN" and transaction is done
atmStep1: Insert your ATM card and select "ENGLISH"
atmStep5: Enter your {{entity_name}} Mandiri Virtual Account Number, then press "CORRECT"
atmStep6: Enter the amount to transfer, then press "CORRECT"
atmStep7: Customer details will be displayed. Choose number 1 according to the amount billed and then press "YES"
atmStep8: Payment confirmation will be displayed. Select "YES" to proceed
atmStep9: Keep your receipt as proof of payment
